    • Constructor Detail

      • RondPoint

        public RondPoint(IPolygon geom,
                 Collection<NoeudReseau> simples,
                 HashSet<TronconDeRoute> internalRoads,
                 HashSet<TronconDeRoute> externalRoads,
                 HashSet<PatteOie> branchings)
        Constructor from the complete components of a characterised roundabout.
        Parameters:
        geom - the round geometry of the roundabout
        simples - the simple crossroads contained in the roundabout
        internalRoads - the roads inside the roundabout
        externalRoads - the roads allowing access to the roundabout
        branchings - the branching crossroads connected to the roundabout

      • RondPoint

        public RondPoint(Ilot block,
                 IFeatureCollection<TronconDeRoute> roads,
                 IFeatureCollection<NoeudRoutier> crossRoads)
        Constructor from a block that represents a roundabout (isRoundAbout returns true). The characterisation of the roundabout is made based on the block geometry and topology.
        Parameters:
        block - the block that is a roundabout
        roads - the roads from the network used here
        crossRoads - the crossroads from the network used here

      • isRoundAbout

        public static boolean isRoundAbout(Ilot block,
                                   double sizeThreshold)

        Determine if a road block object is a roundabout or not. Uses the compactness Miller index measure to determine if the block is round shaped with a compectness threshold of 0,97 (determined empirically) and a size threshold as parameter.

        Parameters:
        block - : the tested road block
        sizeThreshold - : the maximum area of a roundabout (40000 mÂ² advised)
        Returns:
        true if the block is a roundabout.

      • addBranchingCrossRoads

        public void addBranchingCrossRoads(IFeatureCollection<PatteOie> allBranchings)
        The method detects the branching crossroads connected to a roundabout. They are added to the branching crossroads set and the internal and external roads of the roundabout are updated.
        Parameters:
        allBranchings - all the branching crossroads of the network used here

      • getRoundabout

        public static RondPoint getRoundabout(Ilot block,
                                      Collection<RondPoint> rounds)
